name.ch: 雷射與非線性光學專題

goal.en: Some selected topics on Lasers and nonlinear optics including the principles of lasers, laser system design, fundamental of nonlinear optics, lasers and nonlinear-optic systems, applications of lasers and nonlinear optics will be studied and discussed by covering both theoretical design principles and experimental realizations of systems. For this course, I suppose you have accomplished the courses “Electro-optics”, “Laser physics”, “Laser physics”, and “Waveguide optics” or have the equivalent background knowledge.

content.en:
1. Principles of lasers
2. Laser design, fabrication, and properties
3. Laser system design
4. Fundamental of nonlinear optics
5. Lasers and nonlinear optics
6. Lasers and nonlinear-optic systems
7. Applications of Lasers and nonlinear optics
